attributes.action: LET THE RED ARROWS OPEN THE 2012 GAMES
attributes.additional_details: This would be a fitting tribute to the 2 members of the red Arrows who sadly are no longer with us and it is the Olympic games in GREAT BRITAIN and the red arrows are the best display team in the world !!!!! they have preformed in over 40 countries so would be a great way to welcome everyone the the 2012 Olympic games in the UNITED KINGDOM !!
